content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much are you willing to pay for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price for this newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Considering its location and amenities, I believe a price around 800 Euro per month would be reasonable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that offer. The location and quality of the apartment justify a higher price. How about we start at 1000 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. However, I am a student and I'm looking for a price that aligns with my budget. 900 Euro per month would be more in line with what I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I have to consider the costs of maintenance and the value of the location. 900 Euro per month is still below my expectations. Let's meet in the middle at 950 Euro per month. It's a fair price considering the apartment's advantages.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Mr. Schmidt. 950 Euro per month is more acceptable, and it fits within my budget. I agree to the price of 950 Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could reach an agreement, Mr. Abbasi. The apartment will be yours at the agreed price of 950 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
